# epochIndex

**Type Property**

The key you use to access the epoch index (an `Int64` value).

## Declaration

```swift
class var epochIndex: MLMetricKey { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this key to fetch the epoch index value in the [doc://com.apple.coreml/documentation/CoreML/MLUpdateContext/metrics] dictionary.

## Getting the keys

- **lossValue**: The key you use to access the current loss (a `float` value).
- **miniBatchIndex**: The key you use to access the mini-batch index (an `Int64` value) within an epoch.
